name: Cassidy Hutchinson
summary: Former White House aide who served as key witness before the January 6 Committee, providing explosive testimony about Trump's actions during the Capitol attack.

keyStatements.quote: I'm fucking furious. We're going to get charged with every crime imaginable.
keyStatements.context: Trump White House Counsel Pat Cipollone's reaction to January 6

keyStatements.quote: The president said something to the effect of, 'I don't fucking care that they have weapons. They're not here to hurt me. Take the fucking mags away. Let my people in. They can march to the Capitol from here.'
keyStatements.context: Trump's response to armed supporters at rally

keyStatements.quote: Donald Trump is the most grave threat we will face to our democracy in our lifetime, and potentially in American history.

timeline.significance: Started as intern, rose to senior aide

timeline.event: Served as aide to Mark Meadows

timeline.significance: In White House during Capitol attack

credibility.background: Former White House aide with direct access to Oval Office operations, key January 6 witness
positions: Aide to White House Chief of Staff Mark Meadows (2020-2021)

oppositionReasons: Trump knew his supporters were armed on January 6
Trump wanted armed supporters to march to Capitol
Trump is the gravest threat to democracy in American history
Trump's actions on January 6 were impeachable
Trump prioritized overturning election over Constitution
endorsement: Endorsed Kamala Harris for President in 2024
